Yeah, eGroups is screwing up. All the posts are still in order and recorded 
at http://egroups.com/messages/nbwrpg or you can just go to the main site 
(http://nbwrpg.tripod.com) and click on 'Messages'. You can post from there, 
too.

::Prowl/Killer/Striker/DevilDuer::

Prowl flies to the side as he sees Hades' shots heading for him, managing to 
dodge one laser but being hit by another. He aims at Hades and shoots, the 
shot missing by quite alot as Killer tackles him in midair, sending both bots 
flying down at the rocks at an allarming speed.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing Anubis' missile heading for him, Striker jumps to the left. The jump 
proves to be a bit too delayed as the missile slams into his right leg, 
sending pieces of it flying into various rocks.

He growls, activativating his jetpack and flying into the air, firing at 
Anubis from his rifle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer runs into the battlefield, looking around. The Maximals seem to be 
doing well enough. DevilDuer picks out a target: Rampage, firing off at his 
with his rifle.
